sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
sec.p: Ethics approval for the presented study was obtained from the Ukrainian Institute of Public Health Policy Institutional Review Board (# 00007612). Participants provided written informed consent documenting their willingness to participate in interviews and focus groups and to have them audio recorded.

sec.title: Consent for publication
sec.p: This article does not include identifying information from any participant. We used fictious names to protect anonymity of our informants.

sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.
